aggression.description: How forceful the agent should be. 0 = very friendly, 5 = hard‑bargainer.

maxRounds.description: Maximum number of back‑and‑forth counter‑offers before aborting.

priceMarginPct.description: Maximum percentage below the listed price the buyer is willing to propose as the first offer.

responseDelayMs.description: Artificial delay before sending each message (simulates human typing).

useLLM.description: If false, fall back to rule‑based templates only.

allowedPaymentMethods.description: Payment options the buyer is willing to accept.

logChat.description: Whether to store the full chat transcript (encrypted).
